description: Create a new ThreatIntelSet. ThreatIntelSets consist of known malicious IP addresses. GuardDuty generates findings based on ThreatIntelSets.
name: CreateThreatIntelSet

Activate.description: A boolean value that indicates whether GuardDuty is to start using the uploaded ThreatIntelSet.

ClientToken.description: The idempotency token for the create request.

DetectorId.description: The unique ID of the detector of the GuardDuty account for which you want to create a threatIntelSet.

Format.description: The format of the file that contains the ThreatIntelSet.

Location.description: The URI of the file that contains the ThreatIntelSet. For example (https://s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/my-bucket/my-object-key).

Name.description: A user-friendly ThreatIntelSet name that is displayed in all finding generated by activity that involves IP addresses included in this ThreatIntelSet.

Tags.description: The tags to be added to a new Threat List resource.

instance.description: the name of the instance to access

method.description: the name of the method in boto3
